body_html:
I now did all again from scratch. I mean I git pulled freshly, edited WORKSPACE file, added the submodule and said submodule update, changed BUILD file so no libpthread.so files are present (as above), made the LINK_OPTS an empty array in the protobuf BUILD file, made whole tensorflow folder chmod 777, and executed it with your last written command without sudo. I still ran into this issue. Attached my output.txt.
output.txt

I now did all again from scratch. I mean I git pulled freshly, edited WORKSPACE file, added the submodule and said submodule  update, changed BUILD file so no libpthread.so files are present (as above), made the LINK_OPTS an empty array in the protobuf BUILD file, made whole tensorflow folder chmod 777, and executed it with your last written command without sudo.
